properties.Name: Silver Lake
properties.Description: Swim in the summer and snowshoe across in the winter

properties.Name: Bristol Falls
properties.Description: Great swimming hole with places to jump off rocks and climb behind a waterfall

properties.name: Black Sheep
properties.Description: A quaint restaurant loacted in Vergennes, VT. It is a great place to take the family or that cute girl you've been winking to next to Proctor's panini machine. The chicken is the best food you will ever eat. In your entire life.

properties.name: Tourterelle
properties.Description: Head to this upscale, boutique B&B and French restaurant for a meal to remember. While not as tasty as its northern neighbor (Black Sheep) you will not be disappointed by their creative mixture of both French and Vermont style food. $$$$. (especially on valentines day...set menu...consider yourself warned.

properties.name: Bristol Bakery & Cafe
properties.Description: Great spot to relax and get some work done. Highly underrated. Great carrot cake.

properties.name: Otter Creek Brewing
properties.Description: All Middlebury students should be required to head to the local brewery for an evening of debauchery. Otter Creek provides all those lucky enough to taste its wheat juice with a brief taste of the life to come.

properties.name: Woodchuck Cider Factory
properties.description: For those who prefer a daintier, sweeter alcoholic refreshment, head to Woodchuck for a fun date night and a guarenteed hangover the following morning.
